full_summary:
================================DDevice Support Services Tender
------------------------------------------------

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4639514766
* **Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 24, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Procurement Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** None

### Notice Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Notice URL:** N/A

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Shamael Malko-Moore
* **Contact Email:** [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Location:** Ottawa, ON, Canada

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for qualified vendors to provide procurement services. The requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS Tasked Based Professional Services (TBS) in the National Capital Region who have been qualified under Tier 1 and under the procurement specialist category.

### Important Notes

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
*   Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.
